sourceMeaningMnemonic: You're standing in the middle of a <radical>rice paddy</radical> in the <radical>rain</radical> with an <radical>umbrella</radical>. You're standing here because there's nothing else that's very tall around you. You want to get hit by <kanji>electricity</kanji> (aka lightning) to show that it exists.
meaningInfo: Get hit by the electricity. How does it feel?
readingMnemonic: After the <kanji>electricity</kanji> hits you, you feel your face. In it is a huge <reading>den</reading>t.
readingInfo: Feel the indent in your face. It doesn't hurt, strangely, but it is pretty huge. Panic about this dent a bit.
